nodes.text: Bartyn's Retreat was a small island in the planet Lamaredd. In 29 BBY, Guther Bartyn had a mansion there to which he sometimes sent cargoes of food.

In the bad ending of the adventure Reckonings, the angry, native Menahuun raid Bartyn's Retreat, burn up the house and take over the island — something that the player characters would only discover when reaching the place with a cargo of food.
